alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 11 at 9:01PM CDT until September 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM CDT TUESDAY THROUGH EARLY TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 3 to 5 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Sheboygan and Ozaukee Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM CDT Tuesday through early Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include: Vollrath Park in Sheboygan... Deland Park Beach in Sheboygan... Harrington State Park Beaches...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
